item.description:
Join us on June 5th at Middlesex Community College, Lowell, MA for a day of games and fun- try something new or reconnect with a favorite. Learn about games you've never even heard about with our Speed Gaming Event!

Timeline:

11:30-12:00 Registration, check in, coffee, mingling
12:00-12:30: Speed Gaming- Rotate stations to learn about the RPG and Board Games offered. 2 minutes per game, hopefully you'll meet your dream game!
12:30-6:00 Open Gaming: Each RPG will last between 3-5 hours. There are plenty of board games and gm'less games to fill the extra time so we hope you'll get to "date" a few choices!

Role Playing Games
We are still confirming the specific games offered- check brilliantgameologists.com for updates.

Confirmations:
- D&D 4E
- Combat Diaries
- 2 Indie and/or Story Games

Board Games
Along with the RPGâ€™s will be a collection of board games including Dominion, Race for the Galaxy, Zombies!, Settlers of Catan, Carcassone, Ticket to Ride, Pillars of the Earth, Agricola, Word on the Street,Say Anything, Apples to Apples and many more! If you are counting on a specific game on this list or hope to try one not listed, let us know so we don't forget it!


Location:
Middlesex Community College Lowell- cafeteria
33 Kearney Square, Lowell
Address/ Directions

Parking:
MCC has a parking garage- the Lower Docks Garage off of Warren Street with a walkway to the MCC building. There is also on-street parking, but it is limited.

Registration:
Register by June 3rd so we know how many snacks and games to get and prep! On site registration works too, but we may have to do some shuffling so we would love if you register ahead of time!

Admission is free!

If you partake of the snack table, we ask that you contribute $3 to the snack fund.

We will be collecting game donations that we will gift to a local charity that donates toys and games to children in foster care, so bring a gently used game appropriate for kids!

Contact and Registration:
To register or ask questions, send an email to gm@brilliantgameologists.com
Check the website for updated information: www.BrilliantGameologists.com
Go to BrilliantGameologists.com/Mailer and sign up for the mailing list
